TopWebsitesWithMixedContent.description: Top websites with most mixed content and the percentage of mixed content in it.
sql: COUNT(CASE WHEN reqs.url LIKE 'http:%' THEN 1 END) mixed_reqs_total,
COUNT(CASE WHEN reqs.url LIKE 'http:%' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(0)

TopGovernmentWebsitesWithMixedContent.description: Top gubermental websites with most mixed content and the number of those resources.

TopCountriesWithMoreGovernmentWebsitesWi.description: Countries with more government websites that have mixed content
sql: SELECT tld id, total_government_websites_with_mxcont value FROM `enamel-step-2020.httparchive.government_websites_per_country_with_mixed_content`

MixedContentPercentageHistogram.description: Histogram of the percentage of mixed content of all websites.
sql: GROUP BY mixed_percentage ORDER BY mixed_percentage ASC;

MixedContentByType.description: Return mixed content request by types
query: WHERE r.url NOT LIKE ("https%") AND p.url LIKE ("https%")

MixedContentOneType.description: Return mixed content requests of specified type
query: SELECT sum(https) AS httpsPercentage, sum(http) AS httpPercentage
(SELECT mimeType, COUNT(CASE WHEN r.url LIKE ("https%") THEN 1 END)
AS https,COUNT(CASE WHEN r.url LIKE ("http:%") THEN 1 END) AS http, count(r.url) AS total
WHERE p.url like("https%") and mimeType like

HTTPSPercentagePages.description: Percentage of all mobile pages that load with HTTPS
sql: WHERE percent > 5.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC  LIMIT 200

HTTPSPercentageRequests.description: Percentage of all mobile pages that load with HTTPS
sql: WHERE percent > 5.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC  LIMIT 200

HSTSPercentageRequests.description: Percentage of all desktop requests that contain Strict-Transport-Security header.
sql: SELECT ROUND(percent, 2) percent, year FROM `enamel-step-2020.httparchive.HSTSTimeSeries` LIMIT 10
